agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Water & Rural Affairs TIME & DATE: 11:00 AM or upon adjournment Wednesday, April 24, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Charles Perry SB 978 Hughes Relating to a study of the feasibility of converting quarries and surface mine pits for use as water storage reservoirs to enhance this state's available water supply. SB 1392 Rodríguez Relating to the territory of the Culberson County Groundwater Conservation District. SB 2041 Buckingham Relating to the terms and election of the members of the board of directors of the Elm Creek Watershed Authority. SB 2331 Creighton Relating to requirements for programs of water conservation and water conservation plans. HB 337 Larson SP: Campbell Relating to the use of emergency engine cutoff switches on motorboats. HB 723 Larson SP: Perry Relating to a requirement that the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality obtain or develop updated water availability models for certain river basins. HB 547 Canales | et al. SP: Perry Relating to verification of hunting and fishing license information. Public testimony will be limited to 2 minutes. If submitting written testimony, you must include your name or the name of your organization on each copy. Bills deleted after last posting: SB 2394 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
